metadata.title: CVE-2018-17439 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the HDF HDF5 1.10.3 library. There is astack-based buffer overflow in the function H5S_extent_get_dims() in H5S.c.Specifically, this issue occurs while converting an HDF5 file to a GIFfile.

criterions.comment: hdf5 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
